   contain the root `toctree` directive.

GREEN: Genomic Regulatory Elements ENcyclopedia
===============================================

Welcome to the house of GREEN-DB and GREEN-VARAN!
This documentation describes the resources part of the Genomic Regulatory Elements Encyclopedia

- the GREEN-DB 
   a database containing ~2.4M regulatory regions in the human genome
   with associated information on controlled gene(s) and tissue(s) of activity 

- the GREEN-VARAN tool set
   a set of tools to annotate non-coding variants using GREEN-DB and additional information,
   including TFBS, DNase HS sites, UCNE and various prediction scores

GREEN-DB and GREEN-VARAN are described in ##PAPER##
and they are available at: https://github.com/edg1983/GREEN-VARAN

The Download section lists locations to download the GREEN-DB and other resource files needed by GREEN-VARAN

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   GREEN_VARAN
